name: Goryuujin Electro
overview: Goryujin + Electro (aka Goryuujin Electro) is a puzzle game that features 3 game modes: - Collectable Mode: Sort of a story mode in which the player advance through the different levels of the game defeating different opponents. - 1 Player vs Computer - 1 Player vs 2 Player The gameplay is difficult to explain, the goal of the game is to use all of the player pieces or use the ones that the player needs to reach to other part of the board, (for example the player starts in the bottom of the screen and have to reach the top) the harder part is to that before the opponent do it, both players compete to use their pieces to create obstacles that avoid the opponent to reach the other side, using the opening (that is too the closing piece) to close the line and get a point (or more depending of the pieces used). The game got a challenging gameplay but the difficulty level is really hard.
